1.0.name: wordpress/wpeasy-breadcrumb
1.0.description: A wordpress plugin which provide you powerful functionality to integrate breadcrumbs into your site/blog. In this plugin you can set display of breadcrumb on homepage by simply pass 1 into function. To display breadcrumb on home page use wpeasy_breadcrumb(1), if you dont want to display remove 1 from function. To butify the breadcrumb add a css class (wpeasybread) into style.css and add your required style.
